SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model

Class MainTable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.MainTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
public class MainTable extends Object implements Observable
This class represents the common board, and it contains the scoreboard, the drawable cards present on the table and the common objectives. The status changes are managed by the Controller.

      public void initView()
      Initializes the view for all the observers. It sends the nicknames, the global objectives, the cards on hand and the cards on table. Observers are used to update the view of each player.

      Parameters:

      public void setNumOfPlayers(int numOfPlayers)

    • drawCardFrom

      public void drawCardFrom(int position, int playerId)
      Draws a card from either the deck or the board.
      Parameters:
      position - 0: draw first resource card, 1: draw second resource card, 2: draw first gold card, 3: draw second gold card, 4: draw from resource deck, 5: draw from gold deck,
      playerId - the ID of the player who makes this action.

    • checkIfPlayerCanPlay

      public boolean checkIfPlayerCanPlay(int playerId)
      Checks if a player can play its move.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      : true if the player can play, false otherwise.

    • checkAllPlayablePositions

      public boolean[][] checkAllPlayablePositions(int playerId)
      Checks where on the board a player can play its cards.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : the ID of the player.
      Returns:
      : a matrix of booleans representing the playable positions.

    • playCardAndUpdatePoints

      public boolean playCardAndUpdatePoints(int onHandCard, int onTableCardX, int onTableCardY, int onTableCardCorner, int playerId)
      Checks if a player can play a card on the table (over an already existing card's corner). If the card is placed, the respective points (both global board) and are updated.
      Parameters:
      onHandCard - : the position of the card in the hand (0-2).
      onTableCardX - : the row coordinate of the card on the table.
      onTableCardY - : the column coordinate of the card on the table.
      onTableCardCorner - : the corner of the card on the table.
      playerId - : the ID of the player.
      Returns:
      : true if the player can play the card, false otherwise.
